next_steps: Check default route: ip route show default
Check link/Wi-Fi/Ethernet: ip link, nmcli, or dmesg
If using VPN, confirm it isn’t hijacking routes or DNS
recommendations.how_chatgpt_can_help: Paste: ip route show; ip addr; ping results; and the hostname dt-core is calling, and I’ll pinpoint whether it’s routing, gateway, DNS, VPN, or remote-host.
